replies.author: wolski
replies.txt_content:
445484430 发表于 2013-2-11 14:13 
我下载了R4补丁,怎么装
用rar打开服务端，把R4里面的东西丢进去

[img]C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\桌面\QQ截图20130211143613.png[img]C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\桌面\QQ截图20130211143640.pngC:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\桌面\QQ截图20130211143650.png[/img][/img]
